story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful island of Sri Lanka, there lived a young elephant named Kavi. Kavi was a kind and gentle elephant who loved exploring the forests and playing with his animal friends.

One night, as the stars twinkled in the sky, Kavi was feeling a little lonely. He longed for someone to share his adventures with. So, he decided to go on a journey to find a friend who would understand him and keep him company.

As Kavi made his way through the forest, he met many animals who were busy with their own tasks. He helped a monkey gather bananas, played hide and seek with a mischievous squirrel, and even sang along with a colorful bird.

Just as Kavi was about to give up his search for a friend, he came across a small pond where he saw a baby turtle struggling to swim. Without hesitation, Kavi helped the little turtle reach the safety of the shore. The turtle looked up at Kavi with big grateful eyes and smiled.

From that moment on, Kavi and the turtle became the best of friends. They went on many adventures together, exploring the wonders of the island and learning about kindness and friendship along the way.

As the night grew darker and the moon shone bright, Kavi and his new friend snuggled up under a tall tree. Kavi wrapped his trunk around the little turtle, feeling grateful for their special bond.

And so, in the soft glow of the moonlight, Kavi and the turtle drifted off to sleep, content in knowing that true friendship could be found in the most unexpected places.

May your dreams be filled with stories of friendship and love, just like Kavi and the turtle's bond. Good night, little one. Sweet dreams.
